description:
Eric is 24 years old, with a lean, tan body and thick, curly hair. He told us he likes skateboarding, classical guitar, and painting.
In the sex department: "I'm straight but, you know, I've messed around," he confessed. "Couple of times, now and then."
When asked exactly what he meant, he responded, "Took a bath, jacked each other off, a little bit of oral."
He said he has a "couple" of girlfriends currently. He had a boyfriend for a while, but he said it didn't work out.
title: Eric
